casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Shamonte Arnell GREEN. No. 345P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 11, 2006. Barbara S. Blackman, Matthew D. Wunsche, Assistant Appellate Defenders, for Green. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, Beirne M. Harding, Assistant District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of July 2006 by Attorney General Extension of Time to File State's Response to Defendant's Petition for Writ of Supersedeas:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 31st day of July 2006 to file and serve his/her response with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of July 2006."
